sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: However, due to excessive blood loss, he finally can not support.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于失血过多，他终于支撑不下去了。

sentences.english: My other brother Ismail, he also bled to death.
sentences.chinese: 我的另一个哥哥伊斯梅尔也是失血过多而亡的。

sentences.english: Methods Two methods of blood sampling were applied in hemorrhagic shock model.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用两种失血性休克动物模型的取血方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of oxygen therapy in the treatment of high altitude hemorrhagic shock in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨氧疗对高原失血性休克兔的治疗作用。

sentences.english: She had stopped himfrom bleeding to death.
sentences.chinese: 她止住了血，没让他失血过多而死。

sentences.english: But we also know that stopping the bleeding isn’t nearly enough.
sentences.chinese: 但我们同时也很清楚，现在还不足以完全阻断失血。

sentences.english: Patients usually lose a lot of blood during the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，病人在手术过程中会大量失血。

sentences.english: He's losing too much blood. He'll never make it like this.
sentences.chinese: 他失血过多，再这样的话他会撑不下去的。

sentences.english: In pelvic fractures, the most common life-threatening complication is bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 对于骨盆骨折，失血为最常见的危及生命的并发症。

sentences.english: The main cause of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: Median intraoperative blood loss was 500 mL.
Some cases of severe and chronic haematuria may develop blood loss anaemia.
sentences.chinese: 在长期严重血尿的病例会发展失血性贫血。

sentences.english: Genscher nearly bled to death but managed to call police.
sentences.chinese: 詹斯特差点儿因失血过多死亡，还好他挣扎着报了警。

sentences.english: Women can also lose iron and red blood cells from slowly bleeding fibroids in the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 女性也可因子宫肌瘤慢性失血而流失铁和血红细胞。

sentences.english: Bleeding heavily, he flagged down a boat and was taken to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 福格蒂失血严重，他被放在船上送往医院。

definition: to transfuse blood/to give aid and support
to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
coma caused by loss of blood/fainting at the sight of blood/Taiwan pr. [xie3 yun1]
